text: Set the Fire is the debut full-length album by Canadian alternative rock band 54-40, released in 1984 on Mo-Da-Mu. Although no longer in print, Set the Fire and its predecessor Selection were re-released in 1997 on the album Sound of Truth: The Independent Collection. ==Track listing== # "Set the Fire" # "A Big Idea" # "Around the Bend" # "Cha Cha" # "One Place Set" # "What to Do Now" # "Lost My Hand" # "Sound of Truth" # "Broken Pieces" ==References== Category:1984 debut albums Category:54-40 albums
title: Set the Fire
